metadata.title: CVE-2024-10461 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In multipart/x-mixed-replace responses, `Content-Disposition: attachment`in the response header was not respected and did not force a download,which could allow XSS attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 132,Firefox ESR < 128.4, Thunderbird < 128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
